name: Naked Truths - QueenEarth
description:
This should have been on an older project, but I had to make the beat to do it like this. I channeled Usher a little bit. I have BIG dreams for this music video.

A song from my pandemic inspired lyrical project, Queer Core: Behind the Music

Who doens't like a cocky ass song written after the fact . . . Naked Truths lay with you.

Here is the NFT for purchase.

Enjoy a song about lies and cheating. It needed to be 2020 for me to get the harmonies to do this like I would have done it around the firepit with my homies. Talking s**t! It takes a village to do R&B harmonies!


lyrics
Damn
Naked Truths
Lay with you

All these trips
Out of town
What’s really good
You duckin’ dodging me
I’m holding down the fort
Dreaming of
Harvests and progeny
You loggin miles in your black book
Passport stamps
There’s words for women like you
I’d never call you a . . .
Damn
Posting pictures of a smile
That we had to pose to take
You block my calls
So folks can like
What they see
They pictures that we take
When I’m out of town
In silence
And I drop you off at Reagen
The queen of checkin in
She ain’t posting any mentions
Where were you?

Don't want no talk
Take our clothes off
Naked truths lay with you
(Tell me the truth
Or I don’t want to talk to you)
Naked truths lay with you

I hear you talking to me babe
Your story ‘s running in and out of places
You ain’t supposed to be
So why you lie to me
I’m not running from you babe
I’m going to my happy place
This dungeon ain’t for me
So call me when it’s clean
And the beast leaves

Don't want no talk
Take our clothes off
Naked truths lay with you

credits
from Queer Core: Behind the Music, released November 27, 2020
All instruments by QueenEarth unless otherwise noted
Bass and Vocals by QueenEarth
Mixed and recorded by QueenEarth in Baltimore, MD
Written and composed by M Smith
Executive Produced by QueenEarth
Mix and Mastered by QueenEarth
